articles.title: SURPRISE solar storm! G4-class geomagnetic storm hits the Earth, strongest in 6 years - HT Tech
articles.description: The Earth has been hit with a surprise solar storm that no forecaster was able to see. The resultant effect was a severe G4-class geomagnetic storm. Know its impact.
articles.content: For a couple of days, the Earth has been awaiting the solar winds that were released from a massive coronal hole in the atmosphere of the Sun. There were some concerns that a solar storm event so clo… [+2228 chars]
